headline.main: Suicide Dives on Targets Made by 2 Ploesti Raiders

lead_paragraph: MIAMI, Sept. 2 -- The crews of two Liberators were credited by a returning gunner today with having deliberately sacrificed their lives during the recent raid on the Ploesti oilfields by diving their big planes into vital targets.
abstract: suicide dives on targets by 2 US Ploesti raiders described
